text: The New Scooby-Doo Movies is an American animated mystery comedy television series produced by Hanna-Barbera. It is the second animated television series in the studio's Scooby-Doo franchise, and follows the first incarnation, Scooby-Doo, Where Are You! It premiered on September 9, 1972, and ended on October 27, 1973, running for two seasons on CBS as the only hour-long Scooby- Doo series. Twenty-four episodes were produced, 16 for the first season in 1972 and eight more for the second season in 1973. == Episodes == Category:Scooby-Doo television series
title: The New Scooby-Doo Movies
